vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_17.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.13 (patch_17.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Centra4.transfer (patch_17.sol#4-27):
	-! contract_address.call(bytes4(keccak256()(register(string))),CentraToken) patch_17.sol#14-16
	-! contract_address.call(bytes4(keccak256()(transfer(address,uint256))),c2,k) patch_17.sol#18-24
